titleStmt.title: A proclamation against selling of shippes
Proclamations. 1559-08-23
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge, and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation against selling of ships to foreigners.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Identified as STC 7901 on UMI microfilm reel 455.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
